# Goal

Here, give a visual overview of the responses for all data, also those without standard deviations.

```{r}

load(file = "../r_objects/fulldata.rda") # named fulldata

hist(fulldata$lnRR[fulldata$Response.variable == "Chl-a"])
hist(fulldata$lnRR[fulldata$Response.variable == "TOC"])
hist(fulldata$lnRR[fulldata$Response.variable == "TC"])
 hist(fulldata$lnRR[fulldata$Response.variable == "Silt"])



```
